text: <para-intro> The last 50 years have seen a significant increase in the number of tourist traveling worldwide . While some might think
<AC> the tourism bring large profit for the destination countries </AC>
, I would contend that
<AC> this industry has affected the cultural attributes and damaged the natural environment of the tourist destinations </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> Firstly , it is an undeniable fact that
<AC> tourists from different cultures will probably cause changes to the cultural identity of the tourist destinations </AC>

<AC> Take Thailand for example , in the Vietnam War , many American soldiers came to Thailand for a break and involved in sexual and drug activities , these huge demands caused many local businesses opened and expanded , even illegally involved in under - age prostitutes to maximize their profits </AC>
<AC> This was due to the lack of adequate controls by authorities and lead to a bad image of Thailand tourism </AC>
. Therefore this proves that
<AC> international tourism can create negative impacts on the destination countries </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Secondly , there are clear evidences that
<AC> tourism increasingly create harms to the natural habitats of the destination appeals </AC>

<AC> As the Australia ’ s Great Barrier Reef has shown , the billion visitors per annum has generated immense destruction to this nature wonder , namely breaking the corals caused by walking or throwing boat ’ s anchors , dropping fuel and other sorts of pollutions </AC>
. For this reason ,
<AC> many marine lives have been endangered , in the extremes part of the reef become uninhabitable for these marine species </AC>
. Thus , it is apparent that
<AC> tourism has threatened the nature environments </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> To conclude , I strongly believe that
<AC> the tourism has created threatening pressure on both the sociocultural and natural environments </AC>
. If authorities do not take steps to appropriately conserve these precious values , they will be destroyed in the near future . </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> It is every student ' s desire to study at a good university and experience a new environment . While some students study and live overseas to achieve this , some prefer to study home because of the difficulties of living and studying overseas . In my opinion ,
<AC> one who studies overseas will gain many skills throughout this experience </AC>
for several reasons . </para-intro>
<para-body> First ,
<AC> studying at an overseas university gives individuals the opportunity to improve social skills by interacting and communicating with students from different origins and cultures </AC>

<AC> Compared to the peers studying in the home country , it will be more likely for the one who is living overseas to be successful in adapting himself / herself into new environments and situations in life </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Second ,
<AC> living and studying overseas is an irreplaceable experience when it comes to learn standing on your own feet </AC>
<AC> One who is living overseas will of course struggle with loneliness , living away from family and friends </AC>
but
<AC> those difficulties will turn into valuable experiences in the following steps of life </AC>
. Moreover ,
<AC> the one will learn living without depending on anyone else </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Also ,
<AC> employers are mostly looking for people who have international and language skills </AC>
<AC> Becoming successful in this study will give the student an edge in job market </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> one who has studied and lived overseas will become more eligible for the job than his / her peers </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion ,
<AC> there are many difficulties a student might face when studying and living overseas </AC>
. However ,
<AC> living and studying overseas gives the individual a new perspective on the subject that is studied or in general life </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> Studying abroad is one very common thing that students do , and they have different reasons for that . I believe that
<AC> studying abroad has many advantages </AC>
<AC> Students gain a lot out of the experience personally , academically , and culturally </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First of all ,
<AC> students who study outside their countries can get a lot of experience living in a foreign country </AC>
<AC> Living in a new country requires a great amount of flexibility and adaptability in one ' s character </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> students might face many challenges in the host country </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> they should be able to deal with the obstacles that they may encounter </AC>
<AC> Overcoming problems teaches the students how to be more mature and self - independence </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> One other important factor is
<AC> the new academic experience that the students can obtain at the institution where they are pursuing their studies </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> they will get exposed to a different educational system </AC>
<AC> They will meet new professors and new classmates which makes the academic experience different from that in their home country </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body>
<AC> Most important is the cultural aspect of the experience </AC>
<AC> While living in a foreign country , students can learn a lot about the culture of that country </AC>
. Furthermore ,
<AC> they can meet different people of the country </AC>
<AC> They can learn about their way of thinking , their customs and traditions , and way of life </AC>
<AC> Learning about others ' cultures is so important </AC>
<AC> It contributes in building a new understanding in us of how we see the world </AC>
<AC> It makes us more open , and willing to accept different ideas and thoughts </AC>
. Also
<AC> it educates us about the world we are living in </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion ,
<AC> studying abroad does not only have advantages , but also can change us in a very positive way </AC>
. It can influence us in different aspects of life . </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> Everyday , companies offer a huge number of different products to consumers .
<AC> The most effective way to convince consumers to purchase a product is through advertising </AC>
. However ,
<AC> it is not sufficient in itself </AC>
<AC> The product also should satisfy the needs of the consumers </AC>
. In my opinion ,
<AC> advertising is the major reason for high sales of a product </AC>
for several reasons . </para-intro>
<para-body>
<AC> We are mainly introduced to products through advertisements </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> advertisers push the limits of creativity to dispose the consumers to purchase the product </AC>
<AC> When the consumers are impressed by the way a product is advertised , they can be convinced to consider that the product is a need in some cases </AC>
<AC> Recently , there is a very creative advertisements of a soft drink product on TV </AC>
<AC> The story delivers a desired call to drink that soft drink that people tend to drink when the weather is too hot </AC>
. As a result of this ,
<AC> the number of that product being sold will increases </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Also ,
<AC> the more an advertisement of a product takes place in mass media , the more popular the product becomes </AC>
<AC> Advertisement is the most effective way to create a well - known product </AC>
<AC> Consumers tend to purchase the most known product when it comes to picking one out of two different brands of the same product </AC>
<AC> When a product is commonly used , it becomes trustworthy for the society , no matter what quality it is </AC>
. However ,
<AC> it also has to be affordable for the consumer </AC>
. Considering this fact ,
<AC> advertisements have undeniable affects on the society about the product being advertised </AC>
<AC> They make the product preferable </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion , as I believe that consumers should consider major needs when they purchase goods ,
<AC> high sales are obviously a reflection of the powerful advertisements </AC>
. </para-conclusion>
<para-body>
<AC> A raise or a promotion can no doubt increase the morale in the working places </AC>
<AC> Workers understand they have to work harder to meet the boss ' expectations and to make themselves worthwhile </AC>
. For instance ,

due to the fact that

. By doing this ,

. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> To sum up , I believe that

. Alternatively ,

since

. </para-conclusion>
<para-body> Some people claim that
<AC> the prevalent of English brings a great number of benefits for people </AC>
. First of all ,
<AC> it promotes the communication and interaction between different countries more conveniently and clearly </AC>
<AC> In the ancient time , the different languages and geography set barriers for people to exchange their goods and ideas </AC>
. Fortunately ,
<AC> the innovation of plane and train solved the geographical barriers </AC>
<AC> If we can popularize the use of English , the language hinder will disappear as well </AC>
. In addition ,
<AC> English is a beautiful language , which is more systematical and extensive than many other languages </AC>
<AC> Learning English can foster people ' s sentiment and nourish their literature and art </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> However , the opponents believe that
<AC> the dominated status of English has destroyed culture diversity and many less - used languages become extinct </AC>
. Even
<AC> English is a sophisticated language </AC>
<AC> it does not express every detail of life especially in Asia countries , which have totally different linguistic system </AC>
. It is undeniable that
<AC> language contains many aspects of people ' s daily life , which is influenced by culture , environment as well as religious </AC>
. Obviously ,
<AC> these languages have special significance for people who belong to them and using English to replace them is crudity </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> Personally ,
<AC> English as an elegant language should be advocated in many fields to expand the global trade and communications </AC>
. But ,
<AC> we still need preserve other languages for sake of keeping the linguistic and cultural diversity </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Computer - a device which has given a whole new dimension to the human life . Ever since Charles Babbage ( know as " Father of computers ") invented computers , its development never had a pause .
<AC> The whole world is dependent on computers , without which , the world will go back hundreds of years </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body>
<AC> In the modern world , computers are used everywhere </AC>
<AC> Right from flying planes to sending a small document , computers are needed </AC>
<AC> They are used in space programs , wars , hospitals , schools and so on </AC>
<AC> Computers have made human life more easy , convenient and lightning fast </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> in earlier days , if one had to send a message to someone in other country , it used to take months </AC>
. But
<AC> today , it can be sent in few minutes by typing a email and few clicks </AC>
<AC> Computers provide speed , increase efficiency , accuracy , precision , help to increase productivity and other countless benefits are provided by it </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Moreover ,
<AC> future prospects of computers are very bright </AC>
<AC> From a computer as big as a room , it has now been minimized to the size of a palm </AC>
<AC> Nanotechnology is working to make computers to the order of microscopic levels </AC>
<AC> Research on making computerized drone soldiers ( unmanned computer controlled ) is going on </AC>
<AC> There is no end to the evolution of computers </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> However , everything has pros and cons .
<AC> Computers have made humans over - dependent </AC>
<AC> Virus programs , privacy breach , leak of confidential documents , cyber attacks , identity theft , frauds etc . are some of its demerits , from a countless list </AC>
<AC> Computers expose children to vulgar materials </AC>
<AC> They have even invaded mental health of humans , for example , FAD ( Facebook Addiction Disorder - excessive use of social networking website Facebook ) </AC>
<AC> Computers have intruded our lives to the effect that a satellite can peep into our homes and privates lives </AC>
<AC> The recent case of Wikileaks , leaking confidential data is an example of how computers are harmful </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> Nevertheless , with all the mentioned demerits ,
<AC> computers have provided security and sophistication </AC>
too . Thus ,
<AC> dependence on computers is not a bad thing </AC>

. However , one needs to be aware of all the pros and cons and beware of malicious things . Computer was invented for the benefit of mankind and it has fulfilled its objective . Human life today can ' t be imagined without computers , so not depending on them is out of question . </para-conclusion>
<para-intro> The soaring crime rate has led to the proposal that
<AC> it is time for the government to take action to control the proliferation of violent scenes in media </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> Obviously , violence in the media is often portrayed as extreme as possible in order to attract audiences .

<AC> This will definitely set a bad example for the immature audiences who , lacking correct parental guidance and abilities to differentiate the right from wrong , are prone to go astray by imitating the violent behaviors and committing real violent crimes </AC>
as
<AC> they regard the violence as reasonable and justifiable </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> On the other hand ,
<AC> media , such as TV or film , is considered as the correct information source regulated by the government </AC>
<AC> It should be reporting and reflecting true phenomenon in the society </AC>
<AC> Violence , as one of the facts in the real world , certainly has to be reported </AC>
. However ,
<AC> excessive violence would offer misleading information to the public and exert detrimental influence to the society as well </AC>
<AC> It is recently reported in the news that a seventeen - year - old boy killed all his family members , one sister and two parents out of hatred and jealousy </AC>
<AC> In the real world , we are inclined to take extreme approach to tackle a small problem due to excessive violence exposure </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> We cannot deny that
<AC> our society is occupied with the violent scenes and plots at present </AC>
<AC> What the government should do immediately is to strengthen censorship to control the amount of violence in media </AC>
. Otherwise , the violent crime rate will rise continuously and out of control someday . </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Never in history was advertising industry so developed as in modern society and it has led to some adverse sentiments in public because some deliver exaggerated and fake information . Hence whether we should ban all the advertisements or not has aroused much controversy of the public . My view is that
<AC> while some of them are disturbing , we can not overlook other merits the advertisements bring </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First ,
<AC> it is unfair to restrict those public service advertisements which are creative and inspiring </AC>
. In fact ,
<AC> they are not in the purpose of making profits but taking a role of disseminating valued culture , good moral traits and calling for helps for the disabled and the poor </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Besides , it is obvious that
<AC> publicizing brand image or a particular product of mass media could boost sales for companies </AC>
. In a larger sense ,
<AC> it could simulate household spending and therefore promote the economic development of the whole country </AC>
<AC> A recent study shows that after launching an advertising campaign , the sales revenue would increase by 40 %, which is the very fact to verify its positive influences on economic </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> That is not to say , however , that advertisements have no downsides . Of course ,
<AC> the advertising expenses lead to a higher product price and some of them express fake information , creating information asymmetry between consumers and companies </AC>
. Yet ,
<AC> its merits still outweigh these downsides </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> Taken all together ,
<AC> advertisements have its social responsibility and contribute to economic growth </AC>
. We can not deny all of them . However , if those with exaggerated and fake information could be banned , advertisements would be welcomed by more . </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> In modern society , people often face many difficulties under great stress . Therefore , it is necessary for many to find ways to relax . Although miscellaneous people may apply diverse strategies , such as reading , watching movies , or working in their gardens , I argue that
<AC> the most suitable method of reducing stress for modern people is by different kinds of exercise , which can not only improve health conditions but also bring positive emotions </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> It is not surprised that
<AC> exercise play a crucial role in ameliorating physical health </AC>
<AC> Any kinds of sports , such as jogging , swimming , or playing basketball , can effectively facilitate human respiration and circulation system </AC>
. Moreover ,
<AC> these sports can also strengthen muscles and lessen surplus adipose tissues in human body </AC>
<AC> The latter one is of particular importance because nowadays more and more people are suffer from obesity </AC>
<AC> Many studies has points out that numbers of overweight people have increased in developed countries in recent years , which mainly results from insufficient exercises </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body>
<AC> Sports activities can improve mental health </AC>
as well .
<AC> When people exercise , the neuron cells in the brain release a chemical compound named Dopamine </AC>
<AC> This hormone can delight one ' s mind , creating positive feelings </AC>
. Thus
<AC> good exercises can often successfully alleviating one ' s heavy burdens </AC>
. Moreover ,
<AC> rigorous exercise can also hone one ' s will , which enable people to be able to tackle stringent problems and arduous tasks </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In a nutshell ,
<AC> many activities can let humans relax </AC>
. Nevertheless , I assert that
<AC> the best way of diminishing stress is by exercises , which can benefit everyone not only physically but also mentally </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Children tend to visit zoos where various kinds of wild creatures could be seen . When it comes to whether zoos should exist on contemporary society , animal - right activists strongly recommended that wildlife belong to natural environment and zoos should be banned . I would not go along with their viewpoint as
<AC> zoos have irreplaceable benefits in terms of animal preservation and children education </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> There is no denying that
<AC> our environment is damaged day by day due to the fact that excessive pursuit of economic development at expense of eco - system , which pose a great threat to the survival of wild animals </AC>
. In contrast ,
<AC> zoo is a good alternative choice for protecting animals </AC>
as
<AC> various animals could be better protected by specialized staff </AC>
<AC> Once the animal got sick , professional vet will help them promptly </AC>
<AC> Thanks to the considerate care , the diversity of wild animal could be guaranteed </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Additionally ,
<AC> zoos afford a platform to education teenagers , helping to establish eco - friendly behavior towards animals </AC>
<AC> In the zoos , even though wild animals are caged , they have capability to walk in a limited area </AC>

<AC> When children pay a visit to the zoos , they still could observe the eating behavior or leisure activities among animals , which would definitely enrich their knowledge associated with different animals </AC>
. Further ,
<AC> children could acquire the information regarding how to protect wild animals according to guided tour or volunteers </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> On the other hand ,
<AC> complained about the drawbacks of zoos are often heard </AC>
. It is true that
<AC> some zoos are lack of systematic management which attributes to numerous wild animals die because of food shortage </AC>
. Also ,
<AC> being caged in the zoos for long render wildlife lost the ability to survive in nature where is full of cruel competition among various animals </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In order to protect animals , from my perspective ,
<AC> zoos offer a good man - made environment which could prolong the life span of wild animals and cultivate the notion of protecting animals </AC>
. What the zoos should do is improvement of the management system and use the income wisely in preserving wild animals better . </para-conclusion>
<para-body> First , it is generally understood that
<AC> advertising is carried out with the main purpose of promoting different products and services or encouraging people to consume more </AC>
<AC> Advertisements are , therefore , very important for many businesses to increase sales and hence profits </AC>
. Also ,
<AC> to consumers , advertising can bring them many benefits </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> customers of telecommunication services will have an idea about the current offers of different companies </AC>
and hence
<AC> they can compare them and then have a better decision in choosing their internet or mobile phone plans </AC>
. From all of these , it is easy to see why the idea that advertising is a positive part of life will garner strong support . </para-body>
<para-body> However , it can be seen that some people have argued against advertising due to its negative impacts . Firstly ,

. Secondly ,

. Therefore ,

. </para-body>

. Thus ,
<AC> the idea that advertising is a positive part of life can be more supported </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-body> To begin with , it is undeniable that

. For instance ,

. Therefore ,

. </para-body>

. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> The 21st century has witnessed the sweeping trends of globalization , which raises people ' s concerns about whether a single international language should be a necessity or not . From my perspective ,
<AC> a universal language playing the dominant role in the international community is of vital significance to global people </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> It is especially true if we consider the fact that
<AC> a single international language plays a pivotal role in global economic cooperation </AC>

<AC> As businessmen from different countries have access to the same language , they can communicate with each other more efficiently and deeply on trade , which can intensify the transnational cooperation </AC>
. In contrast ,
<AC> without the availability of the same language , there might be a chance that misunderstanding and conflicts would ensue over business negotiations , impeding collaborations between them </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> a single international language serves an economic purpose </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Also ,
<AC> a universal language is an integral part of cultural communication and interactions </AC>

<AC> If people are equipped with a single international language , they can tell each other smoothly about their countries ' specific cultures such as the traditional customs or the modern lifestyles , which enables people to expand their outlooks , viewing the world in new angles </AC>
. For example ,

<AC> when people travel to foreign countries , the local people can introduce the tourist attractions to such people with the command of the universal language , helping foreign visitors have an enjoyable exotic experience </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> In spite of this , the disadvantages of the promotion of a universal language cannot be denied . To be more specific ,
<AC> a single international language may , to some extent , erode the cultural identity of a nation </AC>
. This is because
<AC> people may be impressed by the cultural values brought with the universal language , eroding a sense of national belong </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> some Asians are seeking individualism , previously denied by many Asian countries </AC>
, due to the fact that
<AC> they have gradually identified with such values expressed in American movies , which are imported by the governments as a result of the proliferation of English </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> Therefore , I would conclude that
<AC> a single international language contributes to global community in terms of economic and cultural communication </AC>
. On the other hand ,
<AC> every country should by no means disregard the preservation of their own cultural heritage </AC>
. </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> Whenever an international sporting occasion like the football World Cup takes place , it attracts millions of people all over the world . As sport has become a common passion which passed over every national border ,
<AC> popular sports events can help reduce international tensions remarkably and promote national prides safely </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First and foremost ,
<AC> sports events are good chances for excellent athletes to meet and learn valuable experiences from one another </AC>
so that
<AC> they can improve their results , break records and bring victories to their own countries </AC>
. Because
<AC> a large number of people will gather in the host city for sport events </AC>
<AC> there are many good opportunities for discovering different cultures </AC>
. Consequently ,
<AC> sport events with the spirit of healthiness , honesty and fairness can help strengthen understanding , friendship and solidarity among nations </AC>

<AC> After sharing competitive but interesting moments in each competition , the competitors often shake hands friendly and congratulate the winners , which can lead to an improvement in the relationships among nations </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Secondly ,
<AC> sporting occasions play an essential role in raising patriotic emotions in both athletes and spectators </AC>
<AC> Seeing national flags be honored may be the most emotional moments to each athlete </AC>
<AC> The athlete also seems to be more aware of his responsibilities and he wants to contribute more to his beloved country </AC>
<AC> When witnessing our national flags flying proudly among others , many of us can stop hiding our pride and happiness </AC>
. For instance ,
<AC> when Vietnam became the champion of SEAGAMES for the first time in 2008 , a festival atmosphere permeated into the streets </AC>
<AC> People from all ages turned out to the streets with flags , banners and they sang aloud songs of Ho Chi Minh President </AC>
<AC> The eager atmosphere lasted many next days </AC>
. In fact ,
<AC> some hooligans were so excited that they took part in motor racing or using fireworks illegally </AC>
. However ,
<AC> the hooligans only took a minority of people </AC>
. Therefore , it can be said that
<AC> sport events help to wake up love and responsibilities strongly in each citizen </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-conclusion> In conclusion ,
<AC> international sporting occasions are not only one of the effective solutions to tensions among nations but also a stimulant for releasing patriotic emotions safely </AC>
. Hence , I recommend that big sports events should be held more frequently in the future . </para-conclusion>

<para-intro> In many countries , children are educated from their young age to be independent and responsible for their actions . Their parents allow them to take some jobs because these jobs can help them learn and take responsibilities . However , some people think it ' s not a good educational measure . From my point of view ,
<AC> the benefits of children engagement in paid work outweigh its drawbacks </AC>
. </para-intro>
<para-body> First of all ,
<AC> children can learn about the hardship of earning money </AC>

<AC> When they take some kind of paid work such as looking after babies , doing housework and keeping shops , they will have some life experience and skills which make them mature and can deal with many different situations in real life </AC>
. Therefore ,
<AC> they are likely to understand their parents ' hardship , to respect values of money and to form a good habit of saving </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Secondly ,
<AC> when children take jobs , they tend to be more responsible </AC>
because
<AC> whether they can earn money or not will depend on their effectiveness and attitudes in working </AC>
<AC> To keep their jobs , children will have to try their best to finish their duties </AC>
. For example ,
<AC> if a child works as a shop assistant , he will have to keep an eye on good and products , calculate prices correctly and take responsibilities for any lost </AC>
. </para-body>
<para-body> Some people may argue that
<AC> children will be more material , neglect their study for earning money or be exploited by the employers </AC>
. However ,
<AC> if children get good care and instructions from their parents , they can take advantages of the work to learn valuable things and avoid going in a wrong way </AC>
. </para-body>
